data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Tracy is going to a concert on Friday. The ____ is ____ a ____ city, so ____ will ____ to ____. She ____ take a train ____ her ____ at 8:00 pm, and ____ will ____ to ____ new ____ at 9:00 pm. Her friends will drive her home when the concert is over.
data.partBlankContent: Tracy is going to a concert on Friday. The con____ is i_ a diff_____ city, so s__ will ha__ to tra___. She wi__ take a train fr__ her ci__ at 8:00 pm, and s__ will g__ to t__ new ci__ at 9:00 pm. Her friends will drive her home when the concert is over.
data.fullContent: Tracy is going to a concert on Friday. The concert is in a different city, so she will have to travel. She will take a train from her city at 8:00 pm, and she will get to the new city at 9:00 pm. Her friends will drive her home when the concert is over.
data.answer: 特蕾西星期五要去听音乐会。音乐会在另一个城市举行，所以她得去旅行。她将在晚上8点从她所在的城市坐火车，晚上9点到达新城市。音乐会结束时，她的朋友将开车送她回家。
